message: But I'm too late to avoid it.
I reach up to push her hand away―

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, hey. Making passes at another man when I'm right here?"
But before I can, Koujaku gently takes the woman's hand and presses it to his cheek. She instantly turns bright red.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Yeah! You're terrible! And you got him to touch you, too!"
Koujaku releases the woman's hand with a smile.
He knows how much I hate it when people touch my hair.
It's times like this I wish I could be more like him.
